no_mail_valido.texto: It is not a valid email
no_telefono_valido.texto: It is not a valid phone number
no_nombre_valido.texto: It is not a valid name. Write only letters
contrasena_minimo.texto: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters
signup_success1.texto: The registration has been completed successfully.
signup_success2.texto: We have sent you an email to the email address you have indicated to verify your account.
signup_success3.texto: If you do not see the mail, check your spam tray.
signup_error_1.texto: There was an error during registration.
signup_error_3.texto: If the problem persists, contact the site administrator.
producto_editado.texto: The product has been edited correctly
producto_guardado.texto: The product has been added correctly
limite_tamano_archivo.texto: You can not upload photos larger than 2MB
rellena_todos_campos.texto: Fill in all the form fields
usuario_incorrecto.texto: The user and password do not match
seguro_desea_eliminar.texto: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
usuario_no_activado_1.texto: Your user is not yet active.
usuario_no_activado_2.texto: We can send you the verification email again to the email address you registered with.
instrucciones_reset_pass.texto: To reset your password, we will send you an email to the address you indicate below:
campos_actualizados_error.texto: There was an error updating the fields
reset_pass_success1.texto: An email has been sent to the user you have indicated to us.
reset_pass_success2.texto: Follow the instructions to reset your password.
reset_pass_success3.texto: If you do not see the email, check the spam tray.
reset_pass_success.texto: The password has been updated successfully.
factura_pie.texto: The invoice was created on a computer and is valid without the signature and seal.
seguro_desea_finalizar.texto: Are you sure you want to finalize this order?
error_indeterminado_repetido.texto: Indeterminate error. The product may be repeated.
